title: Does the K-pop group ‘Seventeen’ have any inappropriate lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not that I know of. Some of their songs do have slight cursing (Un Haeng Il Chi, for example), but these are mixtapes and not part of their albums. They write their own lyrics and are very conscious, especially with member Wonwoo revealing that he often checks his rap lyrics with female staff to make sure nothing is inappropriate or potentially offensive.

Their songs are mostly about love and relationships. Inappropriate? Not really. Two songs named “un haeng il chi” and “lotto remix” have some foul language though. But the other songs? No. Not that I heard of. :)
